scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of electrostatic reproductions of photographs of relatives and friends (some unidentified), assembled by Lucy Landon Carter Minor in an album between 1865 and 1870. The copies of numbered photographs are accompanied by a corresponding note identifying each individual in great detail, often with birth and death dates, biographical sketches and genealogical charts of the families of Heloise Isabella Innerarity, John Minor and Lucy Landon Carter. There are also three color electrostatic reproductions of the portraits of Lucy Landon Carter Minor, Heloise Isabella Innerarity, and Surgeon Lewis Willis Minor.
